Topic.Title: Is there a way to mute?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

I'm fairly new here and I just have been enjoying these games so much.  But i also enjoy doing this while watching videos and such.  Is there any way to mute the music or sound in the games that have them?  Any help would be appreciated!

Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
Hello!

I'm fairly new here and I just have been enjoying these games so much. But i also enjoy doing this while watching videos and such. Is there any way to mute the music or sound in the games that have them? Any help would be appreciated!

Thank you!

Posts.EditableText:
If the game uses sound, then I doubt it. I suspect it's possible to code a 'mute' option in there, but unless the author has decided to do so, you're stuck with it.

If there is a default mute button I don't know of it.
Posts.HTML:
If the game uses sound, then I doubt it. I suspect it's possible to code a 'mute' option in there, but unless the author has decided to do so, you're stuck with it.

If there is a default mute button I don't know of it.

Posts.EditableText: Ummmm, just turn down your volume?

```
thetruespin said:
Ummmm, just turn down your volume?
```
Then how do they hear the audio on the videos they're watching?

Posts.EditableText: OurJud is right, any game with sound should have a way to mute it. There are all kinds of reasons why one may want to play silently at times. And if the engine doesn't provide the functionality by default, then it's up to the authors. So pester them!
Posts.HTML: OurJud is right, any game with sound should have a way to mute it. There are all kinds of reasons why one may want to play silently at times. And if the engine doesn't provide the functionality by default, then it's up to the authors. So pester them!
